Class SaslSocketServer

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
org.apache.avro.ipc.SocketServer
org.apache.avro.ipc.SaslSocketServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, Server
public class SaslSocketServer extends SocketServer
A Server that uses javax.security.sasl for authentication and encryption.
